doc.title: Dark Particles
doc.plot: A sense of unease and a feeling of loss. sometimes these things are hard to explain and visualize for others, an image locked in the subconsciousness. Dark Particles is an attempt to lay bare, the visual construct of a thousand vivid dreams. A film about weightlessness, helplessness and a longing to escape from an existence that somehow feels warm and familiar. We all have a dream, but some are darker than others.
